title: Google exec teases what Matter will mean for the Home app: ‘proactive’ actions, lower latency, more
content:
We’ve been hearing about the Matter smart home standard and what it could do for ages now, and things are on track to finally arrive later this year. In an interview ahead of this week’s Google I/O, the company has teased what Matter will mean for the Google Home app going forward.

more…

The post Google exec teases what Matter will mean for the Home app: ‘proactive’ actions, lower latency, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: In a recent interview, a Google executive offered a tantalizing glimpse into what Matter could mean for the Google Home app in the future.
